name: Cookie Roach 2: Welcome To Hell
description:
Take control of Cookie Roach in an EPIC QUEST to destroy all other vermin.

In this ACTION PACKED TITLE you will find:

  • ACTION
  • SWEARING
  • FOUR WHOLE LEVELS FULL OF ENEMIES TO SLAUGHTER
  • POWER UPS TO AID YOU IN YOUR KILLING
  • DISGUSTING BUGS
  • NO COOKIES TO BE FOUND

DOWNLOAD NOW!!!
